issue.title: [Rust] implement FromStr for parquet::basic::Compression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11874](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11874). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be nice to be able to create a compression from a string. We already support compression to string so I think it's only natural to support the inverse as well.
